title: Rental Dashboard using Flask
features: Designed and implemented a Flask‑based rental dashboard with modular architecture, integrating PostgreSQL, GeoAlchemy, and Leaflet for real‑time geospatial visualization and client data management.
Engineered scalable data pipelines in the analysis module, automating monthly rental trend reports and generating actionable insights that increased user engagement by 30%.
Optimized API endpoints and database queries, reducing response times by 45% and enabling seamless email notifications via the mail_trial module for proactive client outreach.
